description: Bug Hunting - Proactively discover and fix hidden bugs in MacML

userStories.title: Investigate race conditions and concurrency bugs
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to find and fix any race conditions or concurrency issues.
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze async/await usage, actor isolation, and shared state
Identify any potential data races or deadlocks
Fix at least one concurrency issue if found, or document why code is safe
Build passes

userStories.title: Find and fix edge case bugs in training flow
userStories.description: As a user, I want training to handle edge cases gracefully.
acceptanceCriteria: Review training service code for edge cases: empty datasets, zero epochs, cancelled mid-training, memory pressure
Identify at least one bug or edge case not handled properly
Implement the fix
Build passes

userStories.title: Audit database operations for data corruption risks
userStories.description: As a user, I want my data to be safe from corruption.
acceptanceCriteria: Review GRDB database operations and migrations
Check for missing transactions, orphaned records, or unsafe deletions
Fix any data integrity issues found
Build passes

userStories.title: Find UI state bugs
userStories.description: As a user, I want the UI to always reflect the correct state.
acceptanceCriteria: Review SwiftUI views for stale state, missing updates, or binding issues
Check for proper @MainActor usage and state synchronization
Fix any UI state bugs discovered
Build passes

userStories.title: Investigate file/resource management bugs
userStories.description: As a user, I want resources properly managed without leaks.
acceptanceCriteria: Review file handles, checkpoint loading, and resource cleanup
Check for memory leaks, unclosed resources, or orphaned files
Fix any resource management issues found
Build passes
